p: where Ya and Yb are the sweet basil and maize yields in sole cropping and Yab and Yba are the yields of sweet basil and maize in intercropping, respectively. LER values >1 shows the superiority of intercropping system in environmental resources consumption for growth and production of plant compared to sole cropping, and when LER <1 resources are used more efficiently in monocropping than in intercropping system (Vandermeer, 1989).
